bibl.title: Papyrology and the Greek Language. A Fragmentary Abecedarius of Desiderata for Future Study.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: HORSLEY, G.H.R.

bibl.note: Introduction. - An Abecedarius: Aspect, Bilingualism, Christian usage, Dating of texts, Epigraphical texts, Fragmentary texts, Genre definitions, Indexes, Jewish usage, Koine and dialect, Lexica, Modern Greek, 'New Papyrology', Onomastics, Particles, Quotations, Register, Sociolinguistics, Translation, Word order. - Conclusion. - Voir les réponses d'Hélène CADELL, pp. 90-93 et de Sten EBBESEN, pp. 96-97.
